Content: A mentally unstable person has forcefully entered two houses in Galbokka, Urubokka and carried out a knife attack. Police said that a 28-year-old woman was killed and a mother aged 64 and her daughter, aged 32 were admitted to Embilipitiya Hospital with critical condition with cut injuries following the attack. The incident had occurred at around 7.30 pm yesterday (Jul 01). Police said that the 40-year-old suspect committed suicide following the attack. Police investigations are underway to ascertain the reason behind the attack.
